content:
looks like a small typo in the link from >= to Generics in this:
https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/tokens.html#punctuation
@oliver Can you clarify what the typo is?
oh, I see you opened a PR. I'll follow up there.
we can discuss here if you think it's not actually a mislabelling
I'm worried I'm missing something obvious about why it's linked

@Eric Huss thanks for the reply, I agree about the tricky nature of the case
and my hesitancy was in part because I imagined some similar use of >= as what
you've outlined, as well I wasn't aware of #567 which I think goes right to the
central idea which is to disambiguate > and =
